attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are told by the government, that we will have to work well into our old age before we are able to draw a state pension. We are also told that it is illegal, for employers to discriminate against age. So how does the government intend to police their policies? Currently,  after being made redundant I feel that I am being discriminated  against at the age of forty seven, so if you feel you have been discriminated against whilst seeking employment, please add your name to this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
